Address.value: 1560 TRAPELO ROAD, WALTHAM, Massachusetts, 02451, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Dyne Therapeutics Inc is a bio-technology company focused on providing therapeutics for patients with genetically driven diseases. The company is developing therapies for muscle disorders like Myotonic dystrophy, Duchenne muscular dystrophy, and Facioscapulohumeral muscular dystrophy.
